description:
1) Setting up Display Color Profiles is kind of bad - maybe there need to be an "Additional Settings" menu to allow more advanced configuration for Color Profile.
2) VPN setup is ambiguous, while remaining basic in it's functionality, which makes it sneaky easy to set up a new VPN profile. 
3) It would be nice to have a gui button in the VPN window to open the old Network Config manager instead of having to open terminal.

Nice interface.

Several things, problems, suggestions, etc..., developers might care and take a look at:
- Settings could have a "feedback" option included. So users can immediately give feedback and help you before any other run into same issues and do the improvements quicker for a better interface experience.
- Nightlight option is confusing the time and region option. e.g.: In my case i'm using "uk" language settings but my time settings are "+4". And Night Light starts 3 hours earlier, if i do not change it to manual schedule.
- Mouse speed and behaviour of acceleration is affected by "tweaks" application. There is no option in both sides; neither in tweaks nor in settings to get rid of it (maybe this is an issue "tweaks" developers should handle, you decide.
- Mouse and touchpad section 'must' have more options like using trackpad with multiple touch and swipe gestures. This is really what people need to use in their daily computer needs. And if there'd be options to re-assign mouse buttons (which no other OS have) like assigning side click (horizontal scroll) to 'switch workspace' could help most of us. I am using an app called 'x-mouse buttons' in ms windows for this (to change the mouse button behaviours) and you would believe how useful it is. 

Regards,

description: Doesnt have much to offer

Although utilisation of this for some very basic configuration is very easy, some of its options are dysfunctional, and some are not updated when updated via other configurators, such as its function that is referred to as "Night Light". Also, although it does respect the theme of the system quite well, its iconography can be rather inconsistent when some themes are applied, as it does only utilise some of the iconography of the theme with its own simultaneously.
summary: Configuration is quite easy, but it does require improvement

description: 默认显示模式是‘拼接显示器’，要调为单显示器。已经看不到的，把鼠标右移出屏幕显示范围，猜测大概位置将设置页面托回显示范围。
summary: 默认显示模式是‘拼接显示器’，要调为单显示器。已经看不到的，把鼠标右移出屏幕显示范围，猜测大概位置将设置页面托回显示范围。

description: 这个不是设置程序的问题，因为默认窗口显示到了了扩展屏幕，Fn+F9切换屏幕为只是用内置窗口就回来了。
19.10 sudo apt install gnome-centrol-center
是因为设置跑到扩展屏去了，打开屏幕设置，将标滑到右面继续滑，然后往回拖，大概找到位置，然后拖回来，显示器改成单屏的即可
